trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_SEQ_00<tab>Emet-Selch seems content to stay where he is.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_TODO_00<tab>Search the area for Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_TODO_01<tab>Search for Meteion beneath the Hungering Gardens.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_TODO_02<tab>Search for Meteion north of the Hungering Gardens.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_TODO_03<tab>Search for Meteion east of the Hungering Gardens.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Hermes.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_HYTHLODAEUS_000_000<tab>Hm? Why am I always so forward thinking? I simply wish to enjoy all that life has to offer!
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_VENAS_000_005<tab>I was prepared to swoop in if need be, but 'tis clear you have faced your fair share of monstrous opponents.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_EMETSELCH_000_010<tab>Hermes said he would not be long, yes? Then we shall wait here until he emerges...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_EMETSELCH_000_020<tab>Ugh, this is an exercise in futility... You have to be the one to find her, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Follow her voice!
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_HYTHLODAEUS_000_025<tab>If I cannot perceive her aether, what else have I to offer but my rousing support!? Ahh, Hermes truly is a master of his craft...

TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_VENAS_000_030<tab>I've strained my senses to their limits, but found nothing. You must calm your mind, that you might hear it─that you might <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> her silent voice!
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_HERMES_000_035<tab>Meteion! Where are you!? Please, answer me! What has happened to you? To your sisters...?
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>You calm your mind, your senses questing for any hint of Meteion's presence...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>...But you fail to hear her voice. She must be elsewhere.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_045<tab>(-Meteion-)It seeps...into my mind... Our voices... Reporting...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_046<tab>(-Meteion-)No, no! Hermes mustn't hear them! I have to run...to hide...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_SYSTEM_000_047<tab>Meteion's anguished voice grows distant as the source seems to flee down the slope...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>You strain to catch even the faintest whisper, but fail to hear Meteion's voice. She must be elsewhere...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_055<tab>(-???-)Greetings...and salutations...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_056<tab>Commencing report...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_057<tab>Oh...oh no, we can't tell them that! We must run... Run far away!
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_058<tab>Please... Don't follow me...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>Meteion's anguished voice fades as you sense her climbing to the top of the ridge...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_070<tab>(-Meteion-)How...? How did it come to this...?
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_071<tab>(-Meteion-)Is this the reason we traveled to the stars? Why we sought out other life-forms?
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_072<tab>(-Meteion-)Is this it? Is this the answer!? No, it cannot be...it cannot be!
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_SYSTEM_000_073<tab>Meteion's anguished voice drifts away to the south...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_080<tab>(-???-)Compiling report for dissemination to Hermes and all peoples of Etheirys...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_081<tab>Processing expedition data... Preparing profiles on intelligent civilizations...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_082<tab>Formulating answers to the question...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_083<tab>Finalizing report...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_084<tab>No, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... You mustn't listen!
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_METEION_000_085<tab>It's wrong...it's all wrong...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_SYSTEM_000_086<tab>Meteion's anguished voice flees towards the lake...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_EMETSELCH_000_087<tab>Any sign of Meteion?
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_EMETSELCH_000_088<tab>Panicked and confused... Which will make it all the more difficult to predict her movements.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_VENAS_000_089<tab>Hermes. What do you make of this situation?

TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_HERMES_000_090<tab>The Meteia are linked to a single mind─a shared consciousness which connects them across any distance. I suspect something has happened which disrupted its usual harmony...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_VENAS_000_091<tab>How might we access this shared consciousness of theirs?
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_HERMES_000_092<tab>Much as you would approach any sentient being: directly.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_HERMES_000_093<tab>In the Meteia's case, that means speaking to any incarnation within physical reach.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_VENAS_000_094<tab>So unless we can track down the Meteion we just lost, we have no means to communicate with them...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_VENAS_000_095<tab>No way of knowing what befell her sisters; no way to provide directions or guidance.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_EMETSELCH_000_096<tab>Then we had best set our musings aside, and concentrate on how we might find her!
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_EMETSELCH_000_100<tab>A frantic search will avail us little. We must be clever about this...

TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_HYTHLODAEUS_000_105<tab>'Tis a shame there is no registered concept we could use to create another Meteion. Assuming of course we could link her to the shared mind! But no, if it were a viable solution, Hermes would have surely suggested it...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_VENAS_000_110<tab>In the Final Days, aether is twisted by the invasion of dynamis from beyond the star, its progress intensified by feelings of fear and despair and anguish...
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_VENAS_000_111<tab>Nay, I like not the picture which emerges with these latest pieces.
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_HERMES_000_120<tab>Oh, my dear Meteion... What did you witness out there that frightened you so?
TEXT_AKTKME117_04435_HERMES_000_121<tab>Why do you seek to keep it from us? How terrible could it possibly be...?
